001package gbw.melange.common.hooks;
002
003/**
004 * Append anything during the render cycle
005 *
006 * @author GustavBW
007 * @version $Id: $Id
008 */
009@FunctionalInterface
010public interface OnRender {
011    /**
012     * Will get invoked every frame, as the very last things that are evaluated.
013     * Already managed elements, meshes and shaders can be modified by classes using this hook, but very much shouldn't be as they are already taken care of.
014     *
015     * @param deltaT a double
016     */
017    void onRender(double deltaT);
018}
